Question
========

We assume that events A and B are disjoint. We know that P(A) = 1/4 and P(B)=1/3. Are they also independent of each other?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Incorrect
* No: Correct
